geosoft.gxpy module reference
=============================

The :code:`geosoft.gxpy` modules provide a Python-oriented API that takes advantage of Python to simplify
much of the complexity of the `low-level GX API <geosoft.gxapi.html>`__.

Submodules
----------

The following sub-modules organize functions into logical groups.

    ======================================= ========================================================
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.agg`                 image aggregates
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.coordinate_system`   geospatial coordinate system support
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.dataframe`           tables, Pandas dataframe compatible
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.gdb`                 Geosoft databases for line-oriented data
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.geometry`            geospatial geometries
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.grid`                grid support
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.group`               group drawing for 2D and 3D views.
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.gx`                  Geosoft GX context
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.map`                 Geosoft maps, which are containers for 2D and 3D views
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.project`             Geosoft project support
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.system`              system functions
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.utility`             general utility functions
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.va`                  Geosoft vector array
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.view`                2D and 3D views
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.viewer`              2D map viewer and 3D geosoft_3dv viewer
    :mod:`geosoft.gxpy.vv`                  Geosoft vectors
    ======================================= ========================================================

See https://github.com/GeosoftInc/gxpy/tree/master/examples for example scripts that use the Python modules.

    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
